snippet: The South African government reported “further improvement” in Nelson Mandela’s treatment for pneumonia.
abstract: South African government officials say condition of former Pres Nelson Mandela is improving as he spends his fifth day in hospital being treated for pneumonia.
lead_paragraph: The South African government reported “further improvement” in Nelson Mandela’s treatment for pneumonia.

headline.main: Mandela Is Improving in Hospital, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Mandela Is Improving in Hospital, Officials Say
